member.name: M:DynExcel.Reader.SheetNames(System.String)
member.summary: Gets all the sheet names stored in the excel file.

member.name: M:DynExcel.Reader.SheetData(System.String,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the data into the selected sheet.
member.param: List of sheet to read, you can pass the name of sheet as a string or integer as the order. This is not need for csv file.
Ranges defining the number of rows and columns will be read. A standard area ref (e.g. "B1:D8").

member.name: M:DynExcel.Writer.Excel(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String[],System.Object[][],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Saves an excel file at the given path.
member.param: The directory where to save the file.
The name of sheet, where the data will be stored.
The headers, matching the number of columns.
member.returns: An information message of the result.
